overview:
Daniel Chisholm is media & technology industry executive, currently serving as Director of Business Development at cloud-based streaming computing service, Gaikai, Inc (a division of SONY) where he was involved in the M&A activities in the Sony acquisition. He is also on the Board of Advisors for Esperanza Productions at Paramount Studios.

Earlier in his career he secured funding from HBO to co-found Delirious, Inc. He has also led teams at Electronic Arts, Activision, and British Telecom in product management of flagship technology and video game franchises such as Medal of Honor and Tony Hawk.

Daniel is a member of the Producers Guild of America. He earned his undergraduate degree in Computer Science at the University of Tennessee and continued postgraduate studies at the UCLA Anderson School of Management.
